name: Curated NYC Restaurant Inspection Results Dataset
description: A curated version of the NYC DOHMH restaurant inspection dataset created for CS598 data curation project. Workflow includes cleaned, de-duplicated fields, with added metadata for seasonality and borough-level analysis.

variableMeasured.name: CAMIS
variableMeasured.description: Unique static identifier for the entity (restaurant)

variableMeasured.name: DBA
variableMeasured.description: Name (doing business as) of the entity (restaurant)

variableMeasured.name: BORO
variableMeasured.description: Borough in which the entity (restaurant) is located

variableMeasured.name: ACTION
variableMeasured.description: Actions associated with each restaurant inspection

variableMeasured.name: VIOLATION CODE
variableMeasured.description: Violation code associated with an inspection

variableMeasured.name: VIOLATION DESCRIPTION
variableMeasured.description: Violation description associated with an inspection

variableMeasured.name: SCORE
variableMeasured.description: Total score for a particular inspection

variableMeasured.name: GRADE DATE
variableMeasured.description: Date when the current grade was issued

variableMeasured.name: RECORD DATE
variableMeasured.description: Date when the extract was run to produce this data set

isBasedOn.name: DOHMH New York City Restaurant Inspection Results
